channel.title: 06scape: [Stage]Development Alpha!
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sCj3LbK.png[/img][/center] [center]____________________________________________________________________[/center] [center][img]http://2006remade.com/img/news/world.gif[/img][b][size=12pt]T[/size]he REAL 2006 Nostalgia has arrived, forever.[/b][/center] [center]____________________________________________________________________[/center]
[size=12pt][b]Hello Moparscapers, Mod Driman (Driman Rune on Moparscape) here,[/b][/size]
I have some exciting new to tell you. The other day when my previous thread was locked, I decided to look at my previous project ([b]2006Lives[/b]). Though It isn't my base, I did add some good things, but I was beginning to write things on my own. I decided I am going to [b]continue[/b] the 2006 project, because I really like the 2006 game play, and I[b] can't[/b] stop[b] thinking[/b] about it. I will also continue the project because I got [i]1[/i] new developer, and I got some positive reports and compliments on 2006Lives.
I will continue and try to update you (the supporters, viewers) as much as I can. ON a [b]serious[/b] note, [b]I promise[/b] you this base is going to be from my unfinished base [b]E300[/b]. I hope by doing this I will gain more supporters, so when I start hosting this project, we will have some players.
What once started as a new base made way back on August 6, 2013, [b]E300[/b] has [b]progressed[/b] to be one of my [b]proudest [/b]and first Runescape Private Server(self made).
I wanted to thank each and every one of you (the supporters, viewers). Without you (the supporters, viewers, and people who wished me luck but think I can't do it) I would of [b]given up[/b] on my source [b]E300[/b]. It makes me laugh( in excitement), when what started as a [b]SOLO PROJECT FOR LIFE[/b], turned to people willing to give up their own free time, just to help.
I am proud to give you the current team of 06scape!:
[size=10pt][b]Mod Driman[Charlie][/b][/size]: Head of the server. 15 years old. [b]SERVER DEVELOPER[/b]
[size=10pt][b]Mod Jason[Jason][/b][/size]: Co of the server. 19 years old. A very trusted friend, who always has been their. We teamviewer each day for hours, and email each other, this guy is a special friend. He is always there for you, and is very humorous. [b]SERVER DEVELOPER[/b]
[size=10pt][b]Mod Mark[Marcus, or Mark][/b][/size]: The first and only Client Developer. 16 years old. A very trusted in real life friend. We had 2 classes together. A very good friend, who I made play Rsps (by force), since he didn't like runescape. He knows: [b]Javam C++, python, and windows OS[/b]. Has taken computer programming for 8 years. (thought by his granddad)[b]Client DEVELOPER[/b]
[[u]4[/u]] Under Review.
[b]August 10-13 2013[/b]
[center][img]http://2006remade.com/img/news/scroll.gif[/img][size=36pt][b] Content:[/b][/size][/center] [center]____________________________________________________________________[/center] [center][img]http://2006remade.com/img/forum/icons/suggestions.gif[/img][b][size=12pt] W[/size]hat 06scape has so far.[/b][/center] [center]____________________________________________________________________[/center]
1. Login protocol added (both source and client). So client is able to connect! - Mod Driman + Mod Jason 2. Finished adding packets. - Mod Jason + Mod Driman+ Mod Mark 3. Finished working on client, fixed some bug(s). - Mod Jason + Mod Mark 4. Client has 4 worlds.(World 1, World 2, World 3, World4, World Development(offline) - Mod Mark 5. Client randomly picks a world, or you an choose(only us) - Mod Mark 6. Fix lot's of the cache - Mod Mark 7. Start working on improving the connecting. - Mod Driman 8. Start on handling packets, interfaces, animations. - Mod Driman, Mod Mark, Mod Jason.
[center][img]http://2006remade.com/img/news/behind_the-scenes_2.gif[/img][size=36pt][b] ScreenShots:[/b][/size][/center] [center]____________________________________________________________________[/center] [center][img]http://2006remade.com/img/forum/icons/suggestions.gif[/img][b][size=12pt] T[/size]media of 06scape:[/b][/center] [center]____________________________________________________________________[/center]
Mod Jason, showing you our, 06scape client. (317 loading 317). (Still need to fix a lot..) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3D1sRCk.jpg[/img]

item.title: 06scape: [Stage]Development Alpha!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Driman Rune, post:55, topic:527876”]fudge THIS COMMUNITY.

I’m done with this shit you’re all idiots who don’t know Java and the difference between completed client and uncompleted client.

This is my last message, I’m moving on to a different community.

fudge YOU ALL, I don’t care if I get infracted I’m never coming here.(not all of you )[/quote]

What a terrible excuse to pretend like you’re quitting only because you’re getting mad. Stop trolling. You can’t actually program this and this is a troll thread.

Read full topic

item.title: 06scape: [Stage]Development Alpha!
item.dc:creator: @Ares1 Ares_
item.description:
@Ares1 wrote:

[quote=“Driman Rune, post:91, topic:527876”]Vain_ are you mental, like Cres?

I told everyone 3 times, the client is unfinished there really isn’t much to client. Seems like you, Cres, and Shane don’t capture and call each other in the morning and say:

Vain_: Hey Cres, hey Shane!
Shane: Hey!
Cres: So how dumb are we going to be today?
Vain_: Wil laren’t we dumb already?
Cres: We sure, are, so how are we going to troll today?
Shane: Like usual.[/quote]

There is no such thing called a unfinished client. I don’t get where you keep saying this. 317 deobs come with everything you need. You either painted the gameframe buttons out like a moron to say you’re adding it in when the jokes really on you. Or you’re a moron and just delete random shit and fudgeed it up either one is quite possible. I’m surprised you manage the concept of breathing.


Wat lol

Read full topic

item.title: 06scape: [Stage]Development Alpha!
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“Driman Rune, post:74, topic:527876”]Converting Runescape’s Java to xml.

Yet doesn’t make his own game, if he feels so good.

[/quote]i’m not converting anything to xml; you idiot. i’m loading configurations from xml. the server is, and always will be java.

[quote=“Docent, post:75, topic:527876”]Listen kid. I’ve only been programming for about 4 months. Look how much I got done in my private server. I’ve added 6+ real runescape quests, all skills, quest requirements to do certain things. Quest points system. cache editing and more. I support any new programmer because they are the building blocks of our future. An OPTIMISTIC programmer, to be more specific. If you keep up this pessimistic attitude I doubt you would keep a job for long[/quote]i actually have a job and support actual programmers whom have the real intent to learn. if someone is too much of an idiot to accept they aren’t ready for something, then they shouldn’t try. i get he wants to learn, but the way he is doing so is all wrong.

this is like me telling you to go build a car, just because you own one.

[quote=“Driman Rune, post:72, topic:527876”]I been coding Java for like a year now :P[/quote]every post you makes shows otherwise. you know nothing of proper conventions or naming. you know nothing of basic java, modifiers, fields, or visibility. seriously. if you want to learn: ask for help. don’t try to ‘show off’ something that isn’t real.

[quote=“Docent, post:77, topic:527876”]Very nice! You are doing quite a lot for a year! :D[/quote]he isn’t actually doing anything?

Read full topic

item.title: 06scape: [Stage]Development Alpha!
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“Cres, post:79, topic:527876”][quote author=Driman Rune link=topic=646627.msg4349442#msg4349442 date=1376419937]
Honestly Vains xml is such a fail, just leave it as Java or make your own game… :palm: :palm: :palm:
[/quote]

@Driman
The core of his server is written in Java. The content handled by the packets is defined in the .XML files. What’s so difficult about that?
You’ve been programming Java for a year now? I could teach a girl from my class to do better than what you’ve shown to us in less than a day.

@Docent
Pessimistic and realistic are often mixed up. I don’t approve 90% of the people releasing the stereotype servers in the downloads section either.
I also advise you to not call him ‘kid’…[/quote]

I look at life in both a optimistic and realistic way. I keep servers true to the game by not adding custom content. Also, no offense to Vain_, didnt really mean ‘kid’ as ‘kid’.

Read full topic
